comment: Can't find watch face on my phone or my Zen watch 3 can I have a refund please.

author: Trevor Gardiner
comment: I didn't expect much especially such a fantastic battery life! This watch face looks great and very much complements off the frame of the LG urbane. Great coloring options with endless color selection on the phone app. It's also a nice touch that there are simple pre set colors that are adjusted off of the watch. Great work!!
title: Shattered expectations!!!

author: Denise Rodriguez
comment: Brings so much color and style to my watch face on my new LG Urbane. Just found this app and it is really great!Thanks for such a different kind of watchface. Question -What do the 2 numbers on the watchface represent? Thanks again!!

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi, thank you for your rating :) In the center of the watch face, the hour is displayed (can be deactivate by settings) with optional display of the seconds. Right below the hour, you will find the watch battery (on the left) and the date (on the right)

title: Terrific Watch Face!

author: Josh Landis
comment: Finally working on LG G watch, my favorite watch face now. Need to be able to adjust the digital time size and switch to 12 hour time (from the watch itself) and this'll be a 5 star face for sure. Thanks to the dev for this one.
title: Definitely showing promise!

author: Doug Turner
comment: The time is stuck on 24 hour mode with no apparent way to fix it.
title: I little disappointed

author: June's Finest Gemini
comment: I love this watch face. It looks really great on my Android Wear watch. But please include an option where I can change the font. Thanks in advance
title: Very Good Watch Face but...

author: Loukas Karampogias
comment: Very cool looking, a must for Sci fi fashion addicts.   4/5 because it does not have an option to show steps measured. I think it's sort of important.

author: Justin Brumitt
comment: Absolutely love it. Wouldn't mind a little more widget customization but either way it's the only watch face I'll ever use. A+++++++++
title: Love it

author: Richard Walter
comment: Something TRON related I can show off. Looks great on my Huawei watch
title: Finally!

author: Bobby Meadows
comment: Download it. It's way cooler than the CGI Jeff Bridges. 😀
title: Pretty friggin' rad

author: Adrian I
comment: Brings my Huawei watch screen to it's full potential.
title: Freaking awesome!

author: B Jones
comment: Fixed with the new update!

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Can you send me an email with the option you used and their values, and your phone / watch device names? It will help me to reproduce your issue, and try to solve it. Thanks

author: Gustav Blomkvist
comment: I absolutely love the theme :)
title: Cool watchface

author: Chris Tanjuaquio
comment: Just download it.
title: Phenomenal

author: William Hale
comment: Love it!!

author: Daniel Vance
comment: The watch face looks great. Gets the elecTRONic feel and font just right, and being able to select the color "teams" is great to get my Clu on.  Emailed the developer with a question before I bought the app on a Saturday and  they responded withing a couple hours. Great focus on the customer. Definitely going to get more of thema's watch faces for my moto 360
title: Responsive Developer

author: Sunny Lalli
comment: After some fiddling it seems to work fine.   However the digital readout could be alone without the weird coloured background.   Would make ir much nicer

reply.author: thema
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback ! I will add an option to customize the digital clock background.
I also found out that the background was rendered twice, it will be more transparent from now.

title: Update

author: Terry Wilson
comment: Thanks for adding 12 hr mode.
title: Looks Awesome!

author: Mark B.
comment: Looks nice.  Needs a 12 hour mode (which all faces should offer).  Will give 5 stars when 12 hour mode hits.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback, I will add this option soon :)

author: Michael Beattie
comment: I like the idea, but just doesn't look that great on square screens. Shame.
title: Sony smartwatch 3

author: Carl Graser
comment: I don't like the look I'm removing.and the display turns off to fast it should have option to have display on longer like others do

author: Kevin Satterly
comment: Just in short, beautiful look.  If you are wanting tie watch to stand out then get this.
